data.title: Worth a trip to check out....
data.text: Roasters was introduced to us by friends and I have to say this place is good: good food for the value. The Roswell location in a little crampt but not terrible. It has been busy every time we have eaten here. The food, reminiscent of typical diner fare, but that is the charm of it and is very satisfying. If you need a quick meal while shopping in the area, my wife and I recommend highly!!!

data.title: Roasters always delivers
data.text: Roasters is consistent. Prompt service and food arrives quickly. It can get crowded quickly during lunch hours. Love the corn bread and yeast rolls.

data.title: Really good food at a really good price
data.text: Local barbecue restaurant in a strip shop ... small but super friendly folks.  Outside patio for dining in good weather.  Beer and wine available.  Every single person I encountered when I was there had a smile n their face and were extremely.  Food was good and plentiful.  Pulled pork plate, green beans and cole slaw ... my fare for the evening along with a glass of Mark West Pinot Noir.  Fair amount of parking available.

data.title: Excellent Ribs
data.text: During a family visit to Atlanta, our Atlanta's relative took us to Roasters. Very cozy place with amazing ribs, corn bread and baked beans. Service was good.  The ribs portion was enough for two.

data.title: Excellent
data.text: We have eaten at Roasters on Lenox Rd. twice now, both visits we had excellent food and service. Looking forward to another visit.

data.title: Google...lead me to some good food!!
data.text: We were in town for a wedding searching for a place to have dinner. We like to eat places we don't normally eat when we go out so we searched the internet and found this place.   Boy ooooohhhh boy, we were pleasantly surprised!!  The food was fantastic!!!! Good food, good service and good experience! We will be back!!!!

data.title: Good food but go early
data.text: Awesome food. The place gets crowded at dinner and at lunch. The chicken fingers deserve 5 out 5 stars. Their vegetables are all very well seasoned and are awesome. Their corn muffins are really good too. Definitely a must stop at place for lunch or dinner.

data.title: Don't be fooled by the exterior
data.text: This unassuming diner-style restaurant has food that is remarkable.  Try anything barbeque; don't miss the mac and cheese; leave room for the key lime pie.  Reasonable prices, fast service, friendly wait staff await you.

data.title: Good food fast
data.text: First dinner and it was very good. I got my normal vegetable plate while wife for chicken salad. Both were very good. Service fast and friendly. Not fancy but good eats.

data.title: Just Ok...
data.text: Roasters was just OK for me I think I probably need to do a re-visit and order something different. I was invited here by a couple of friends during my visit here in Atlanta. When I arrived I was somewhat greeted by the hostess who assumed for whatever reason that I was meeting somebody else there and just pointed to the back. I wasn't in much of a BBQ mood and I probably should've done the research on YELP before accepting my invite here. But the food was kind of bland I ordered this BBQ WRAP and mac n cheese as a side. the wrap had lettuce in it that appeared wilted as well as the mac n cheese tasted like it may have been out of the box. From what my friends say they seemed to like the dishes they ordered so next time I should go for one of the BBQ chicken plates and or maybe even the ribs! Better luck next time!

data.title: Prompt service and great meal at reasonable price
data.text: Came here for dinner. Restaurant is on a strip mall. Parking is easy. Speedy service, good variety on menu at very reasonable prices. Wish I discovered this place sooner.

data.title: I like it!!
data.text: Enjoyed nice lunch. Casual atmosphere with food service. A little noisy but not bad. I like the southern style vegetables and wife had fruit salad.  Good location and no reason not to eat here unless you just want a more formal place or different type of food.

data.title: Great selection of yummy foods
data.text:
So many veggies! This place is known for their chicken, and in my opinion I'd stick with it. Both the rotisserie and if you so desire, fried chicken fingers, are tasty. 
Love the number of sides you have to choose from, as you can switch it up every visit and not get tired of this place. 
The bread here is ridiculous. Both the yeast rolls and the cornbread are dangerously addictive, and you can fill up on them first if you aren't careful!

data.title: Chicken and vegetable headquarters
data.text: Lunch today was 1/4 white chicken with broccoli/cauliflower casserole and green beans for my wife and a four vegetable plate for me.  I chose black eyed peas, sweet potato soufflé, fried green tomatoes with ranch dressing, and fried okra - not particularly healthy or dietetic choices, but it sure was good.  Accompanying our food order were two corn muffins and two yeast rolls each.  Everything was quite tasty - not a disappointment on either plate.

data.title: Always a Very Good Place to Eat and Unwind or Visit With Friends
data.text: The food and service is consistently excellent with a very relaxed atmosphere.   Most entree's are fixed from scratch and the veggie's are perfect.  Prices are very reasonable.  Sometimes a little noisy but its a small place and should be expected.

data.title: Yummy rotisserie chicken salad!
data.text: We now have a new idea for how to make a great salad at home!  Rotisserie chicken was shredded and tossed with greens, cukes, tomatoes, tortilla chip strips, etc., etc.  It was great!

data.title: Always good!
data.text: This place is an Atlanta staple. The food is always good and the staff are very friendly. Love the fresh veggies and the chicken is excellent.

data.title: Veggies
data.text: Really enjoyed their veggies at lunch. Good assortment of southern style choices. Staff friendly and service is prompt. Really want to try one of their salads; maybe next time.

data.title: Excellent family fun
data.text: I love roasters.  Great veggies, chicken salad, best chicken tenders.  Great chicken sandwich, love the cole slaw.  Wait staff is excellent.

data.title: food for run
data.text: roasters a fave for years-- wings-- etc-- white chicken chili like u cant make-- good staff and location-- good to go food-- ribs etc.
